description:
Bondrewd the Novel a White Whistle of ill repute in charge of Idofront, the Cave Riders` forward Operating Base in the 5th layer. He was the one responsible for several unethical experiments on children, including the one who transformed http://anidb.net/ch89866 [Nanachi] and http://anidb.net/ch91497 [Mitty] into Narehate.
Source: Wikipedia, edited.
name: Bondrewd
